actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To exempt small, rural communities from landfill requirements contained in regulations promulgated by the Environmental Protection Agency.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to exempt from solid waste management regulations, including requirements that landfills have clay or plastic liners, any landfill located in: (1) a municipality with a population of 5,000 or less; or (2) a county with a population of 10,000 or less, or fewer than 20 persons per square mile, and not within a metropolitan area.

titles.title: To exempt small, rural communities from landfill requirements contained in regulations promulgated by the Environmental Protection Agency.
